name: erc721nes
description: ERC-721 NES, or Non Escrow Staking, is a novel implementation of a staking model that does not require the owner of a token to lock it into an escrow contract.

scripts.deploy-patch: git tag deploy-patch && git push origin deploy-patch && git tag -d deploy-patch
scripts.deploy-minor: git tag deploy-minor && git push origin deploy-minor && git tag -d deploy-minor
scripts.deploy-major: git tag deploy-major && git push origin deploy-major && git tag -d deploy-major
